dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-04 1994 Southern Study Area Jack Pine LAI & FPAR Data
title: BOREAS RSS-04 1994 Southern Study Area Jack Pine LAI & FPAR Data
summary: Contains Decagon Ceptometer estimates of LAI and fPAR. Contains LI-COR LAI-2000 estimates of leaf area index and mean tip angle.
